A man has been arrested in connection with the assault and robbery of a 93-year-old woman in her own home.

Write a short summary for the following passage:
The victim was woken by an intruder in Argyle Street, Saltcoats, at 02:00 on 25 June.
He assaulted her before escaping with some of her possessions in what officers said was a "very distressing experience".
Police said they had arrested a 27-year-old man over the incident. He is expected to appear in court on Monday.
Summary:
